select

from replication_applier_configuration
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
insert into replication_applier_configuration
CHANNEL_NAME,
DESIRED_DELAY,
REQUIRE_ROW_FORMAT,
REQUIRE_TABLE_PRIMARY_KEY_CHECK,
ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_TYPE,
PRIVILEGE_CHECKS_USER,
ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_VALUE,

mapper.update:
update replication_applier_configuration
CHANNEL_NAME = #{record.channelName,jdbcType=CHAR},
DESIRED_DELAY = #{record.desiredDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REQUIRE_ROW_FORMAT = #{record.requireRowFormat,jdbcType=CHAR},
REQUIRE_TABLE_PRIMARY_KEY_CHECK = #{record.requireTablePrimaryKeyCheck,jdbcType=CHAR},
ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_TYPE = #{record.assignGtidsToAnonymousTransactionsType,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRIVILEGE_CHECKS_USER = #{record.privilegeChecksUser,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_VALUE = #{record.assignGtidsToAnonymousTransactionsValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},

update replication_applier_configuration set CHANNEL_NAME = #{record.channelName,jdbcType=CHAR}, DESIRED_DELAY = #{record.desiredDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REQUIRE_ROW_FORMAT = #{record.requireRowFormat,jdbcType=CHAR}, REQUIRE_TABLE_PRIMARY_KEY_CHECK = #{record.requireTablePrimaryKeyCheck,jdbcType=CHAR}, ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_TYPE = #{record.assignGtidsToAnonymousTransactionsType,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRIVILEGE_CHECKS_USER = #{record.privilegeChecksUser,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_VALUE = #{record.assignGtidsToAnonymousTransactionsValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}

update replication_applier_configuration set CHANNEL_NAME = #{record.channelName,jdbcType=CHAR}, DESIRED_DELAY = #{record.desiredDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REQUIRE_ROW_FORMAT = #{record.requireRowFormat,jdbcType=CHAR}, REQUIRE_TABLE_PRIMARY_KEY_CHECK = #{record.requireTablePrimaryKeyCheck,jdbcType=CHAR}, ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_TYPE = #{record.assignGtidsToAnonymousTransactionsType,jdbcType=CHAR}

update replication_applier_configuration
DESIRED_DELAY = #{desiredDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REQUIRE_ROW_FORMAT = #{requireRowFormat,jdbcType=CHAR},
REQUIRE_TABLE_PRIMARY_KEY_CHECK = #{requireTablePrimaryKeyCheck,jdbcType=CHAR},
ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_TYPE = #{assignGtidsToAnonymousTransactionsType,jdbcType=CHAR},
PRIVILEGE_CHECKS_USER = #{privilegeChecksUser,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_VALUE = #{assignGtidsToAnonymousTransactionsValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=CHAR}

update replication_applier_configuration set DESIRED_DELAY = #{desiredDelay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REQUIRE_ROW_FORMAT = #{requireRowFormat,jdbcType=CHAR}, REQUIRE_TABLE_PRIMARY_KEY_CHECK = #{requireTablePrimaryKeyCheck,jdbcType=CHAR}, ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_TYPE = #{assignGtidsToAnonymousTransactionsType,jdbcType=CHAR}, PRIVILEGE_CHECKS_USER = #{privilegeChecksUser,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ASSIGN_GTIDS_TO_ANONYMOUS_TRANSACTIONS_VALUE = #{assignGtidsToAnonymousTransactionsValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where CHANNEL_NAME = #{channelName,jdbcType=CHAR}
